column1: Little Goat Diner////Very nice breakfast place!  It uses a Korean spin on many popular breakfast options for amazing flavors that aren't usually found at breakfast time.  The service as always been great when I've had breakfast at Little Goat
column2: but a longer line can develop on the weekends
column3: so I'd advise that diners get there before 9AM if they'd like to experience this West Loop treat with a minimal wait time.
